items.sentence: In the United States, cars drive on the right side of the road.

At that time, I didn't yet know if Tom would go with me or not.
I don't think that Tom can play the violin as well as Mary can.
Tom doesn't think that Mary knows that it was him who did that.
Tom says that he remembers absolutely nothing about that night.
I realized that I was probably not going to be able to do that.
Is it true that you alluded to an intention to divorce Taninna?
